attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage has been instrumental in facilitating our passage out of the European Union.
Had we still been a member state we would have not had the vaccination programme we do now. 
The benefits of our exit are immeasurable. 
I do not believe it could ever have happened without him and therefore he deserves to be honoured with a knighthood.
attributes.background: I would like to see this man given appropriate recognition for his work in getting us out of the EU.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
